1370: Maelkin moved to Papenhofstede.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Berta at age 34 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Berta, Brundonis, at age 34.
1372: Had a son with Berta, Menaures, at age 36.
Lost daughter Brundonis when Brundonis was 3 years old.
1374: Had a son with Berta, Wybel, at age 38.
1375: Had a son with Berta, Brandekijn, at age 39.
1376: Had a son with Berta, Didderic, at age 40.
1377: Had a daughter with Berta, Hadewigis, at age 41.
1378: Had a daughter with Berta, Machtilden, at age 42.
